Title: Chapter 14
Writer: Michael Dobbs (based on the novels by), Andrew Davies (based on the mini-series by), Beau Willimon (created for television by), Beau Willimon
Actors: Kevin Spacey, Robin Wright, Kate Mara, Michael Kelly
Plot: Frank prepares for his promotion to Vice President. Doug tries to erase all leads leading back to him and Frank. Claire fights back against Gillian. Zoe considers working with Frank again.
